disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Monday 13 June to end of Monday 13 June GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Monday will be cloudy with sunny intervals and temperatures around 20 degrees.<br/><br/>A gentler breeze than Sunday may mean a slight rise in local particulates, but overall air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>

currentForecast.forecastSummary: The forecast for tomorrow is not available yet but should be issued around midday. GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: The forecast for tomorrow is not available yet but should be issued around midday.
